content:
I do not have personal preferences or subjective experiences, but i can provide you with some information that might be relevant when deciding which of these restaurants to choose for a special occasion:

- the brown derby: this might be a good choice if you or your guests are fans of classic hollywood movies and would appreciate the historical significance of the place.

- musso & frank grill: if you are looking for a classic hollywood experience, musso & frank grill could be an excellent option, given that it has been a favorite of celebrities for over a century.

- the rainbow bar and grill: this might be the right choice if you prefer a more laid-back and casual atmosphere, and you are interested in the rock and roll history of hollywood.

- yamashiro hollywood: if you are looking for a stunning location with beautiful views and a unique atmosphere, yamashiro hollywood could be worth considering.

- the polo lounge: this is a high-end restaurant in one of la's most iconic hotels, so it might be the best option if you are looking for a luxurious and elegant experience.
